body_html:
@tongda I don't have a machine with gcc6 handy. But meanwhile, can you post the output of

$ bazel build -s --copt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" -c opt //tensorflow/core/user_ops:zero_out.so

I wanted to make sure that -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 is really being used.
body:
@tongda I don't have a machine with gcc6 handy. But meanwhile, can you post the output of

```
$ bazel build -s --copt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" -c opt //tensorflow/core/user_ops:zero_out.so
```

I wanted to make sure that `-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0` is really being used.
